department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: To teach students the basic concepts of object-oriented programming and analysis so that students can write maintainable object-oriented source code in their implementation.
goal.ch: 讓學生具備物件導向基本概念，然後可以在實作的過程中可以精進程式碼的撰寫，進而寫出具備可維護性之高品質程式碼

content.en:
1. Introduction to software engineering
2. The history of object-oriented technology
3. An introduction to C++
4. Inheritance
5. Polymorphism
6. encapsulation
7. modeling
8. Database normalization and ERD diagram
9. UML Class Diagram
10. UML sequence Diagram
11. Design Patterns
content.ch:
1. 軟體工程問題簡介
2. 物件導向技術發展的歷史與緣由
3. 物件導向程式設計語言C++簡介
4. 繼承
5. 多型
6. 封裝
7. 塑模(modeling)概念簡介
8. 資料庫系統分析正規化與 ERD diagram
9. UML Class Diagram
10. UML sequence Diagram
11. Design Patterns

textbook.en:
“1. An Introduction to Object-Oriented Analysis (objects and UML in plain English) by David William Brown.
2. UML Distilled, A brief guide to the standard object modeling language - Martin Fowler
3. Design Patterns
4. Head First Design Pattern“
textbook.ch:
“1. An Introduction to Object-Oriented Analysis (objects and UML in plain English) by David William Brown.
2. UML Distilled, A brief guide to the standard object modeling language - Martin Fowler
3. Design Patterns
4. Head First Design Pattern“

grading.en:
1. Programming project and exercise 60％
2. Case Study 10％
3. written exam 30％
grading.ch:
1. 程式作業 60％
2. Case Study 10％
3. 期中期末考 30％

ch.competency: 發掘、分析及處理問題的能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現
作業練習 ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現
作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 創新及獨立思考之能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 溝通協調與團隊合作能力
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 洞察資訊技術潮流與國際趨勢
專案規畫與管理之能力
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 終身學習與自我成長之能力

en: Department:MSc in Computer Science and Information Engineering、Institute of Software Engineering、Master‘s Program in Artificial Intelligence, Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering、PhD in Computer Science and Information Engineering only.
ch: 系所:限資訊工程學系碩士班、資訊工程學系軟體工程碩士班、資訊工程學系AI碩士班、資訊工程學系博士班。
